column5: Hey guys,  I will be staying at Greenville in South Carolina for work this coming week and wonder if there are any shopping destinations & fishing tackle shops I can check out after work  Thanks in advance!
Not much goin on in Greenville unless it's drastically changed in 5 years.  You can always visit the Beemer plant??
Beemer plant is where I am going for work ...  could not find anything interesting after googling for a while

http://www.yellowpages.com/greenville-sc/fishing-tackle  http://www.yellowpages.com/greenville-sc/bait-shops  http://www.yellowpages.com/greenville-sc/fly-fishing-shops  http://www.ptfishingworld.com/  http://www.baitnet.com/search.php?action=citylist&state=SC&city=Greenville  http://www.greenvillemarine.com/    No idea when Cabela's opens.  http://www.cabelas.com/custserv/custserv.jsp?pageName=greenville2
LOL. Figured as much . Not many other reasons to visit Greenville/Spartanberg unless youre in the auto industry. A few good restaurants in 'downtown' Greenville just can't remember the names.
I would head to dark corner distillery. Looks like good shine there. When in Rome.
